msContents.summary: Collection of sermons and homilies for 2nd to 24th Sundays after Pentecost.

msItem.author: Ps.-Leo I
msItem.title: Serm. ined. viii
msItem.rubric: Item sermo eiusdem unde supra de Absalon filio David
msItem.incipit: Perdidit Absalon scelestissimus mentem.

msItem.author: Caesarius of Arles
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Dominica iii. Homo quidam fecit cenam magnam.
Sermo Beati Augustini Episcopi de plaga Dei
msItem.incipit: Cum regum lectio legeretur audivimus.
msItem.note: Serm. App. 38, PL 39 col. 1821–2; Caesarius, Serm. 122, ed. G. Morin in C.C. 103–4, pp. 509–11. No. 35 in the collection of sermons on the Old Testament in MS. Bodl. 199, henceforth referred to as O; see Morin, loc. cit., pp. lix–lxii.

msItem.author: Caesarius of Arles
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Item sermo cuius supra de iudicio Salemonis et de duabus meretricibus
msItem.note: Serm. App. 39, PL 39 col. 1822–3; Caesarius, Serm. 123, C.C. 103, pp. 512–14. No. 36 in O.

msItem.author: Caesarius of Arles
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Dom. iv. Accesserunt ad Ihesum publicani…
Sermo beati Augustini episcopi de beato Helia
msItem.note: Serm. App. 40, PL 39 col. 1823–6; Caesarius, Serm. 124, C.C. 103, pp. 514–18. No. 37 in O.

msItem.author: Caesarius of Arles
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Item sermo cuius supra de eo quod scriptum est de sancto Heliseo propha. Ascende calve
msItem.note: Serm. App. 41, PL 39 col. 1826–7; Caesarius, Serm. 127, C.C. 103, pp. 523–6. No. 39 in O.

msItem.author: Caesarius of Arles
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Dom. v. Estote ergo misericordes …
Sermo beati Augustini episcopi de Heliseo propheta
msItem.note: Serm. App. 42, PL 39 col. 1827–30; Caesarius, Serm. 128, C.C. 103, pp. 526–30. No. 38 in O.

msItem.author: Caesarius of Arles
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Item sermo cuius supra de dilectione caritatis et odio cupiditatis et quod regnum celorum non solum duobus minutis sed etiam bona voluntate emi possunt possit
msItem.note: Serai. App. 270, PL 39 col. 2247–503; Caesarius, Serm. 182, C.C. 104, pp. 739–43.

msItem.author: Ps.-Augustine
msItem.title: Serm. app. 43
msItem.rubric: Dom. vi. Cum turbe irruerunt ad Ihesum.
Sermo beati Augustini episcopi de Naaman Syro
msItem.note: Serm. App. 43, PL 39 col. 1830–2. No. 41 in O.

msItem.author: Caesarius of Arles
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Sermo eiusdem unde supra de Heliseo et Gezi puero eius
msItem.note: Serm. App. 44, PL 39 col. 1832–4; Caesarius, Serm. 129, C.C. 103, pp. 531–4. No. 40 in O.

msItem.author: Caesarius of Arles
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Dom. vii. Amen dico vobis quia non abundaverit iusticia…
(fol. 18v) Sermo beati Augustini episcopi de Heliseo et Securi in Gurgite lapsa
msItem.incipit: Cum divina lectio legeretur
msItem.explicit: ęterni iudicis proficiat, quod ipse etc.
msItem.note: Serm. App. 45, PL 39 col. 1834–6; Caesarius, Serm. 130, C.C. 103, pp. 535–7 1. 31.

msItem.author: Ps.-Augustine
msItem.title: Serm. app. 46
msItem.rubric: Item sermo cuius supra de famę Samarię
msItem.incipit: Cum a cultu Dei gens iniqua discedit.
msItem.note: Serm. App. 46, PL 39 col. 1836–7. No. 42 in O.

msItem.author: Augustine
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Dom. viii. Cum multa turba esset cum Ihesu …
Sermo B. Augustini episcopi de eo quod scriptum est in proverbiis. Sunt qui se divites affectant… Et item. Redemptio animę viri divitię eius pauper autem non suffert minas
msItem.note: Augustine, Serm. 36, PL 38 col. 215–21, ed. Lambot in C.C. 41, 434–43.

msItem.author: Bede
msItem.title: Expositio in Parabolis Salomonis
msItem.rubric: Dom. ix. Attendite a falsis prophetis …
Sermo venerabilis Bedę presbiteri de proverbiis Salemonis Regis
msItem.incipit: Sapientia foris predicat.
msItem.note: Bede, parts of Expos, in Parab. Salomonis, Lib. 1 cap. 1 and iii, PL 91 col. 942C5–943A11, adiungitur; 949B4, Fili mi–951B14, tenemus.

msItem.author: Augustine
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Item unde supra sermo beati Augustini episcopi de timore Dei
msItem.note: Augustine, Serm. 348, PL 39 col. 1526–9 1. 38

msItem.author: Bede
msItem.title: Expositio in Parabolis Salomonis
msItem.rubric: Dom. x. Homo quidam erat dives …
(fol. 31r) Sermo Venerabilis Bede presbiteri de Proverbiis
msItem.incipit: Non metuat de correptione
msItem.explicit: in futuro donabitur, prestante domino etc.
msItem.note: Bede, Expos, in Parab. Salomonis, parts of Lib. I cap. iii–iv, PL 91 col. 951D4–955A14.

msItem.author: John Chrysostom, pseudo
msItem.rubric: Item unde supra sermo beati Iohannis Crisostomi de Misericordia
msItem.incipit: (fol. 34r) Tria sunt quę in misericordię opere optanda.
msItem.note: Pr. Io. Chrys. Opera, Basle, 1547, v, col. 927–9.

msItem.author: Bede
msItem.title: Expositio in Parabolis Salomonis
msItem.rubric: Dom. xi. Cum appropinquaret dominus Ihesus Hierusalem …
Sermo Bedę presbiteri de Proverbiis
msItem.incipit: Melius est vocare ad holera cum caritate
msItem.explicit: iusti vident placidum Ihesum Christum etc.
msItem.note: Bede, Expos. in Parab. Salomonis, parts of Lib. 11 cap. xv–xvi, PL 91 col. 984D9–988A9.

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Hom. de festis
msItem.rubric: Sermo cuius supra de timore Dei et vera humilitate
msItem.note: Ps.-Aug., Serm. App. 297, PL 39 col. 2313–15; Rabanus Maurus, Hom. de Festis 54, PL 110 col. 99–101.

msItem.author: Caesarius of Arles
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Dom. xii. Dixit Ihesus ad quosdam qui in se confidebant …
Sermo beati Augustini episcopi de beato lob et de versu psalmi Cantate et exultate et psallite in cythara et voce psalmi in tubis ductilibus et voce tubę corneę
msItem.note: Serm. App. 52, PL 39 col. 1844–5; Caesarius, Serm. 132, C.C. 103, pp. 542–5. No. 43 (44) in O.

msItem.author: Ps.-Augustine
msItem.title: Serm. app. 50
msItem.rubric: Dom. xiii. Exiens Ihesus de finibus Tyri …
Sermo beati Augustini episcopi de beato lob
msItem.note: Serm. App. 50, PL 39 col. 1841–2. No. 45 (46) in O.

msItem.author: Caesarius of Arles
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Item sermo cuius supra de beato lob
msItem.note: Serm. App. 51, PL 39 col. 1842–4; Caesarius, Serm. 131, C.C. 103, pp. 539–41. No. 44 (45) in O.

msItem.author: Bede
msItem.title: In librum beati patris Tobiae allegorica expositio
msItem.rubric: Dom. xiv. Beati oculi qui vident …
Sermo venerabilis Bedę presbiteri de libro Tobię
msItem.incipit: Liber sancti patris Tobie
msItem.explicit: cęlestia petatis, quę vobis petentibus ipse concedere dignetur cui est honor etc.
msItem.note: Bede, parts of Interp. in librum Tobiae, PL 91 col. 923–8A8, haereticis (MS. erraticis); 930A13, ingressus–932D12, in gentibus; 933B8, Dimisit–934D4, exspectamus; 935B12 Rediturus–936A6, petatis.

msItem.author: Ps.-Augustine
msItem.title: Serm. app. 47
msItem.rubric: Item sermo cuius supra de beato Tobia
msItem.note: Ps.-Aug., Serm. App. 47, PL 39 col. 1838–9. No. 48 (49) in O.

msItem.author: Ps.-Augustine
msItem.title: Serm. app. 48
msItem.rubric: Dom. xv. Dum iret Ihesus in Hierusalem…
Sermo beati Augustini episcopi de Iudith
msItem.note: Serm. App. 48, PL 39 col. 1839–40. No. 49 (50) in O.

msItem.author: Ps.-Augustine
msItem.title: Serm. app. 49
msItem.rubric: Item sermo cuius supra de eodem
msItem.incipit: (fol. 54v) Quotiens bellicus rumor terribili fama
msItem.note: Serm. App. 49, PL 39 col. 1840–1. No. 50 (51) in O.

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Commentary on Esther
msItem.rubric: Item sermo cuius supra de libro Hester
msItem.incipit: Septimo ergo anno regni Assueri Hester accessit ad thalamum
msItem.explicit: crescit in gaudio ęternę exultationis. Ad quam nos Deus per suam gratiam concedat venire cui est laus etc.
msItem.note: Rabanus Maurus, parts of Expos, in librum Esther, cap. IV and v–xi, PL 109 col. 649B6-C12; 650D12–661A1; 661A4, nisi quod–D4.

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Commentary on Maccabees
msItem.rubric: Dom. xvi. Nemo potest duobus dominis servire …
Sermo de libro Machabeorum
msItem.incipit: Elegit Lysias Ptolomeum … Quid per Lysiam nisi fastus mundanus designatur
msItem.explicit: gaudebunt inmortalitate. Cuius nos participes esse ipse dominus concedat cuius maiestas etc.
msItem.note: Rabanus Maurus, Comm, in I Macc., cap. III v. 38-IV v. 24, PL 109 col. 1151D13–1157B7.

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Commentary on Maccabees
msItem.rubric: Dom. xvii. Ibat Ihesus in civitatem …
Sermo de libro Machabeorum
msItem.incipit: Congregavit Lysias electorum … Elegit Lysias sexaginta milia virorum
msItem.explicit: obtemperat voluntati, annuente ipso domino Ihesu Christo etc.
msItem.note: Rabanus Maurus, Comm, in I Macc. cap. iv v. 28–48, PL 109 col. 1157D2–1160C12.

msItem.author: Ps.-Augustine
msItem.title: Serm. app. 71
msItem.rubric: Sermo beati Augustini episcopi unde supra
msItem.note: Serm. App. 71, PL 39 col. 1880–4.

msItem.author: Pope Leo I
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Feria iiii septimi mensis. Cum intraret Ihesus in domum …
Sermo beati Leonis papę de Ieiunio
msItem.note: Leo I, Serm. 91, PL 54 col. 450–3.

msItem.author: Pope Leo I
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Item sermo cuius supra
msItem.note: Leo I, Serm. 93, PL 54 col. 456–7.

msItem.author: Pope Leo I
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Feria vi. Sermo beati Leonis papę
msItem.note: Leo I, Serm. 92, PL 54 col. 453–6.

msItem.author: Pope Leo I
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Sabbato in xii lectionibus. Sermo beati Leonis papę
msItem.note: Leo I, Serm. 94, PL 54 col. 458–60A14
msItem.explicit: Quod uni horum fecistis mihi fecistis.

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Commentary on Maccabees
msItem.rubric: Dom. xviii.
Sermo de libro Machabeorum
msItem.incipit: (fol. 79r) Factum est ut audierunt gentes … Irritantur gentes cum viderint
msItem.explicit: perpetuo comburunt, quia Deus contempnentes se ignobiles reddit et glorificantes se glorificat, qui cum patre etc.
msItem.note: Rabanus Maurus, Comm, in I Macc., cap. v v. 1–28, PL 109 col. 1163–7C11.

msItem.author: Augustine
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Item sermo beati Augustini episcopi de eo quod Dominus ait. Si vis venire ad vitam serva mandata
msItem.note: Augustine, Serm. 85, PL 38 col. 520–3.

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Commentary on Maccabees
msItem.rubric: Dom. xviiii. Accesserunt ad Ihesum pharisei …
Sermo de libro Machabeorum
msItem.incipit: Congregavit Thimotheus exercitum … Postquam Timotheus semel atque iterum victus est
msItem.explicit: pervenire poterant. Quam et nos possidere concedat gratia domini, qui est benedictus etc.
msItem.note: Rabanus Maurus, Comm, in I Macc., cap. v v. 37–54, PL 109 col. 1168 B4–1171C7.

msItem.author: Augustine
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Dom. xx. Ascendens Ihesus in naviculam…
Sermo beati Augustini episcopi in basilica Celerinę
msItem.note: Augustine, Serm. 48, PL 38 col. 316–20 1. 8; pr. Lambot, C.C. 41, pp. 605–11. He uses our MS.

msItem.author: Ps.-Augustine
msItem.title: Serm. app. 59
msItem.rubric: Dom. xxi. Loquebatur Ihesus cum discipulis suis…
Sermo B. Augustini episcopi de tribus pueris
msItem.note: Serm. App. 59, PL 39 col. 1855–6; No. 46 (47) in O.

msItem.author: Ps.-Augustine
msItem.title: Serm. app. 60
msItem.rubric: Item sermo cuius supra
msItem.note: Serm. App. 60, PL 39 col. 1857–8. No. 47 (48) in O.

msItem.author: Augustine
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Item sermo cuius supra
msItem.note: Augustine, Serm. 38, PL 38 col. 235–41; pr. Lambot, C.C. 41, pp. 476–87.

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Hom. de festis
msItem.rubric: Dom. xxii. Erat quidam regulus…
Sermo beati Augustini episcopi
msItem.note: Serm. App. 280, PL 39 col. 2274–6; Rabanus Maurus, Hom. de Festis, 41, PL 110 col. 76–8.

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Hom. de festis
msItem.rubric: Dom. xxiii. Simile est regnum celorum homini regi…
Sermo de fide, spe et caritate

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Hom. de festis
msItem.rubric: Item sermo de castitate et mundicia
msItem.note: Ps.-Aug., Serm. App. 291, PL 39 col. 2296–7; Rabanus Maurus, Hom. de Festis 47, PL 110 col. 87–8.

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Hom. de festis
msItem.rubric: Item sermo de studio sapientię et meditatione divinę legis
msItem.note: Ps.-Aug. Serm. App. 302, PL 39 col. 2323–4; Rabanus Maurus, Hom. de Festis 48, PL 110 col. 88–90.

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Hom. de festis
msItem.rubric: Dom. xxiiiL Sermo de pace et unitate
msItem.note: Ps.-Aug., Serm. App. 98, PL 39 col. 1932–4; Rabanus Maurus, Hom. de Festis 52, PL 110 col. 95–7.

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Hom. de festis
msItem.rubric: Item sermo de misericordia et indulgentia
msItem.note: Rabanus Maurus, Hom. de Festis 51, PL 110 col. 93–5.

msItem.author: Rabanus Maurus
msItem.title: Hom. de festis
msItem.rubric: Item sermo de continentia
msItem.note: Ps.-Aug., Serm. App. 290, PL 39 col. 2294–6; Rabanus Maurus, Hom. de Festis 50, PL 110 col. 92–3.

msItem.author: Augustine
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Sermo beati Augustini episcopi
msItem.note: Augustine, Serm. 127 Mai, ed. Morin, Misc. Agostiniana 1 (1930), 368–70.

Also found, with same ending, but attributed to St. Jerome, in MS. Vienna 994, 9th cent., from Salzburg Cathedral, fol. 99; see Lambot in Rev. Bén. 45 (1933), 97, and, for provenance and date, H. J. Hermann, Die ilium. Hss. der Nat. bibl. Wien I (Beschr. Verzeichnis der illum. Hss. in Oesterreich viii), Leipzig, 1923, pp. 173–4, no. 64.

msItem.rubric: Sermo beati Augustini episcopi
msItem.note: A patchwork of fragments also found in MS. Vienna 994 cit., fol. 100v:

msItem.incipit: Si tam vehementer

msItem.author: Augustine
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.incipit: Crediderunt in eum
msItem.note: Augustine, part of Serm. 302, § iv–v, PL 38 col. 1387 11. 7–12; ed. Lambot, Stromata Patristica et Mediev. 1 (1950), 102, 1. 18–20.

msItem.incipit: Quod Christus pro nobis sanguinem fudit. Reddidi pretium
msItem.explicit: Sed si quod accepimus custodiamus. Quare karissimi?
msItem.note: Slightly fuller at beginning and end than the fragment from MS. Vienna 994 attributed by Lambot to St. Augustine and pr. by him in Rev. Bén. 51 (1939), 25–7.

msItem.author: Augustine
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.incipit: Etiam cum fit cathecuminus
msItem.explicit: (fol. 112v) in resurrectione mortuorum cum eo cui se crediderunt Christo domino nostro cui honor et gloria in secula.
msItem.note: Augustine, part of Serm. 302, § v–viii, PL 38 col. 1387 1. 12–1388 1. 44; pr. Lambot, Stromata cit. 1, p. 102 1. 20–104 l. 18.

msItem.author: Ps.-Augustine
msItem.title: Sermo
msItem.rubric: Sermo sancti Augustini de misericordia
msItem.incipit: Misericordia fratres peccatorum est remedium. Misericordia ipsa est quę a morte liberat
msItem.explicit: fac misericordiam quia non te deserit, qui te prerogatorem suum constituit.
msItem.note: Version of Serm. App. 310, PL 39 col. 2340–2. The same version is in MSS. Vienna 994 cit., fol. 105, and Vat. Reg. Lat. 500, fol. 155v.

msItem.author: Augustine
msItem.title: Sermones
msItem.rubric: Item sermo beati Augustini episcopi
msItem.note: Augustine, Serm. 84, PL 38 col. 519–20. In MS. Vienna 994 cit., fol. 122. Ends fol. 115 (pastedown).

layoutDesc.layout: Ruled space 225 135 : 30 long lines ruled with a hard point

decoDesc.decoNote: There are a number of early marginal scribbles, many of them done with a stylus.

The MS. has a series of fifty-one fine initials, mostly of the vinescroll type, akin in style to those of the 12th-cent. Salzburg school. They are outlined in mauve ink, except for the last four, which are in brown ink, and occasionally shaded in green, with solid backgrounds of blue, green, and pink.

The following have figures: fol. 29v, a naked boy, bird and monster heads; fol. 55v, a man, bird and dog; fol. 67, naked boy and monster; fol. 77v, man and monster; fol. 79, man and monster; fol. 88v, naked man and bear; fol. 91, naked man; fol. 93v, man and monster; fol. 97v, man; fol. 99v, young man standing holding two monsters; fol. 102v, bearded man seated between two monsters; fol. 103v, man and monster; fol. 106v, naked green man. Others have animals only: birds (fol. 22, 43, 70), monsters or monster heads (fol. 13, 27, 36, 44, 46, 54v, 74v, 92), a bear (fol. 105r). Pächt and Alexander i. 73, pl. VI, (fol. 77v).

binding.p: Monastic binding of original wooden boards covered in rough white leather; original sewing; two clasps on modern straps (1 missing); parchment title (15th cent.?) on front cover: Sermones dominicales post Penthecosten b. Augustini et aliorum sanctorum doctorum; remains of a later title on spine.

history.provenance: Formerly in the library of the Benedictine abbey of Lambach in Austria, where it was MS. xxiv: the shelfmark M. memb. xxiv (early 19th cent.) is on the spine, where there is also an earlier label: MS. 21. On the front cover is the number D. 6 in red (parchment label, 15th cent.?) and on fol. 1 24 (18th–19th cent.). Not in the library catalogue of c. 1210 but listed in later inventories; see K. Holter, Zwei Bibliotheksverzeichnisse des 13. Jh., M.I.Ö.G. 64 (1956), 275, no. 141; idem, Stift Lambach. Die Hss. und Inkunabeln, Österreichische Kunsttopographie xxxiv, ii (1959), 236, Hg. 283.

Bought by Lyell in May 1940 from Maggs Bros.: see their Cat. 542 (1930), no. 37, and pl. (fol. 43r) and Cat. 687 (1940), no. 216, pl. 22 (fol. 103v) and cover (fol. 106v). Exh., Gladbacher Handschriften-Ausstellung, Mönchengladbach, April–May 1964, no. 32.
history.acquisition: Chosen as one of the hundred manuscripts bequeathed to the Bodleian by Lyell in 1948.

recordHist.source: Description adapted from A. de la Mare, Catalogue of the Medieval Manuscripts Bequeathed to the Bodleian Library Oxford by James P. R. Lyell (1971); with additions by Andrew Dunning. Catalogue, p. 163 Catalogue, p. 164 Catalogue, p. 165 Catalogue, p. 166 Catalogue, p. 167 Catalogue, p. 168

ref.title: Manuscripts from German-Speaking Lands – A Polonsky Foundation Digitization Project

msItem.title: Antiphonal
msItem.note: The front pastedown is a leaf from a 12th-cent. monastic Antiphoner (?) with a portion of matins for the Innocents, responsories only.

revisionDesc.change: art 42: noted as Rabanus Maurus, as well as Ps.-Augustine; ex inf. Christoph Galle.
Andrew Dunning Revised from description by Albinia de la Mare.
